alert.note: Alert for Bent; Crowley; Kiowa; Las Animas; Otero; Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 27 at 1:27PM MDT until April 27 at 2:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 200 PM MDT FOR OTERO...SOUTHWESTERN KIOWA...NORTHEASTERN LAS ANIMAS...CROWLEY... EAST CENTRAL PUEBLO AND SOUTHWESTERN BENT COUNTIES... At 124 PM MDT, the leading edge of an area of strong winds from dissipating showers was located along a line extending from 18 miles northeast of Boone to near Higbee, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. Earlier automated weather sensor at Pueblo indicated a wind gust of 64 mph. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... La Junta, North La Junta, Rocky Ford, Fowler, Ordway, Swink, Manzanola, Olney Springs, Sugar City, Cheraw, Crowley, Higbee and Timpas. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Wind damage with these storms will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. SEEK SHELTER IMMEDIATELY inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Bent; Crowley; Kiowa; Las Animas; Otero; Pueblo
